code:
defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
start do
   set(:item , 60)
  cue("hello")
  set(:item , 64)
  cue("goodbye")

end

defmotif "hello" do
  wait_for(:beat1)
  play_synth(get(:item),5)

end

defmotif "goodbye" do
  wait_for(:beat3)
  play_synth(get(:item),5)

end

end
